title: Bar Crawl Through History
text:
Caption Max On Main Courant File Photo Patrons line the bar on a Saturday night at Max on Main.
Patrons line the bar on a Saturday night at Max on Main.
(Courant File Photo) Brown Thomson Happy Hour Jeff Wheeler/ Hartford Courant Patrons line up outside the Brown Thomson happy hour in 1980.
Patrons line up outside the Brown Thomson happy hour in 1980.
(Jeff Wheeler/ Hartford Courant) See more galleries Connecticut is not lacking when it comes to bars. Take a look back at some of pictures from watering holes through the years. You can have a look at more modern options here .
